page.title: 09Shopping
page.content: In a survey we did recently, people from{Letwell, Gildingwells, Woodsetts, all go to Dinnington for their shopping.There are a few shops like Newsagents and Grocers in these villages, but{Dinnington}has quite a good selection of shops. Dinnington market which is held on Fridays and Saturdays is{particularly}good when shopping for food, clothes,sweets and biscuits and cakes, carpets, wool and fabrics,pet food, fish,fruit and vegetables,shoes,toys, antiques, hardware and{cosmetics.}There is also {a }take-away-food-stall.There are two small{supermarkets}in Dinnington,the big supermarkets with things like crisps,a variety of sweets, and a variety of food and hardware, are in {Worksop or Rotherham.
